heading: royal y2k retreat
subheading: not everyone will be partying this new year's eve. prince charles will be hunkering down in his own millennium retreat on the grounds of his country home. according to the daily telegraph, charles prefers his own private sanctuary to the glitz of prime minister tony blair's millennium dome in london. at least charles will be escaping the y2k madness in a manner fit for royalty.
author: wired staff
text: not everyone will be partying this new year's eve. prince charles will be hunkering down in his own millennium retreat on the grounds of his country home. according to the  daily telegraph, charles prefers his own private sanctuary to the glitz of prime minister tony blair's millennium dome in london. at least charles will be escaping the y2k madness in a manner fit for royalty.
